description: Signals a UI component (like the action buttons renderer) to update the display of currently available player actions based on the provided list of action objects.

payloadSchema.title: UIUpdateActionsPayload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload for the 'textUI:update_available_actions' event, containing the list of available action objects.

actions.description: An array of objects, each representing a valid action the player can currently take, including its ID, name, description, and formatted command.

items.description: Object containing the action ID, name, description, and its formatted command string.

id.description: The unique ID of the action definition (e.g., 'core:wait').

name.description: The human-readable name of the action (e.g., 'Wait').

command.description: The formatted command string ready for display/parsing (e.g., 'wait', 'go north').

description.description: A detailed description of what the action does.
